rooms.name: entrance hall
rooms.description: A minimalist entrance area with a North-facing door, aligned with Vastu principles for inviting energy and positivity.

rooms.name: open kitchen/dining/living area
rooms.description: An open-plan space that combines kitchen, dining and living areas in a seamless minimalist design, featuring efficient storage solutions and streamlined decor.

rooms.name: studio bedroom
rooms.description: A compact yet comfortable studio bedroom designed with built-in storage to maximize functionality while maintaining a minimalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with essential fixtures and water-saving installations, integrated into the studio layout for convenience.

rooms.name: storage/utility
rooms.description: Small utility room designed to store cleaning supplies and other essentials, keeping the living area clutter-free.

openings.description: Pathway leading from the living area to an adjoining outdoor swimming pool space
